update sys_menu
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_menu set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from sys_menu m left join sys_resource r on m.resource_id = r.id where m.status != 2
and m.parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and m.name like concat(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and m.status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by sort

select
from sys_menu m left join sys_resource r on m.resource_id = r.id where m.status != 2 and m.parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by sort

select
from sys_menu m left join sys_resource r on m.resource_id = r.id where m.status != 2 order by sort
select count(1) from sys_menu where status != 2 and parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(1) from sys_menu where status != 2 and resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
